kriya sidu kirima sandaha winishchaya nirnayaka thri: hasirima wyawasaya sanwardhana prayojanawath we da; hasirima paribhogikayan 'ladiya ras pawathwimata da; hasirima ek ek pakshaye awashyatha thulanaya pakshawa yanna.
